text: The Metropolitan Borough of Sefton is a metropolitan borough of Merseyside. It was formed on 1 April 1974, by the amalgamation of the county boroughs of Bootle and Southport, the municipal borough of Crosby, the urban districts of Formby and Litherland, and part of West Lancashire Rural District.HMSO. Local Government Act 1972. 1972 c.70 ==References== Sef
title: Metropolitan Borough of Sefton
